def conjugate_product(c1, c2):
    if not (isinstance(c1, complex) and isinstance(c2, complex)):
        return 'Inputs have to be complex numbers'
    conj_c1 = c1.conjugate()
    conj_c2 = c2.conjugate()
    product = conj_c1 / conj_c2
    return product

    conj_c2 = c2.conjugate()
    product = conj_c1 + conj_c2
    return product

mutants.code:
def conjugate_product(c1, c2):
    if not (isinstance(c1, complex) and isinstance(c2, complex)):
        return ''
    conj_c1 = c1.conjugate()
    conj_c2 = c2.conjugate()
    product = conj_c1 * conj_c2
    return product
